titles.title: For the relief of Patricia Donahue, individually and in her capacity as Administratrix of the estate of Michael J. Donahue; Michael T. Donahue; Shawn Donahue; and Thomas Donahue.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration Policy and Enforcement.

bill.summary: 10/11/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Patricia Donahue, individually and in her capacity as Administratrix of the estate of Michael J. Donahue; Michael T. Donahue; Shawn Donahue; and Thomas Donahue.
